name: credit-jambo-client
description: Credit Jambo Client Application - Mobile Banking App

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.deploy: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
